Token.Abstract: Objects implementing the RKManagedObjectCaching protocol can act as the cache strategy for RestKit managed object stores. The managed object cache is consulted when objects are retrieved from Core Data during object mapping operations and provide an opportunity to accelerate the mapping process by trading memory for speed.
Retrieves a model object from the object store given a Core Data entity and the primary key attribute and value for the desired object.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The Core Data entity for the type of object to be retrieved from the cache.

Parameter.Name: primaryKeyAttribute
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the attribute that acts as the primary key for the entity.

Parameter.Name: primaryKeyValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value for the primary key attribute of the object to be retrieved from the cache.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectContext
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context to be searched for a matching instance.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A managed object that is an instance of the given entity with a primary key and value matching the specified parameters, or nil if no object was found.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves an array of model objects from the object store given a Core Data entity and the primary key attribute and value for the desired object.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The Core Data entity for the type of object to be retrieved from the cache.

Parameter.Name: primaryKeyAttribute
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the attribute that acts as the primary key for the entity.

Parameter.Name: primaryKeyValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value for the primary key attribute of the object to be retrieved from the cache.

Parameter.Name: managedObjectContext
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context to be searched for a matching instance.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of managed objects that are instances of the given entity with a primary key and value matching the specified parameters, or nil if no object was found.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to inform the receiver that an object was fetched and should be added to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object that was fetched from a managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to inform the receiver that an object was created and should be added to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object that was created in a managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to inform the receiver that an object was deleted and should be removed to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object that was deleted from a managed object context.
